You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

Dataset: webnlg

Here is the data, now generate text using the provided data:

final_response: Aleksandr Prudnikov was born on February 24, 1989. He began his football career at the youth club FC Spartak Moscow and has played for FC Terek Grozny, a club based in Grozny. Currently, he plays for FC Amkar Perm.
